grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 侮【ブ】(something) despised, (something) made light of
侮辱【ブジョク】insult, affront, slight, contempt (e.g. of court)
kun reading compounds: 侮る【あなどる】to disdain, to look down on, to make light of, to hold in contempt, to scorn, to despise
侮る【あなどる】to disdain, to look down on, to make light of, to hold in contempt, to scorn, to despise
